overview: Corey is a software engineer at Firespotter, and also the lead cat herder of the company – just ask his cat Skittles. Previously, he was a lead test architect for Windows Phone 7 at Microsoft and helped develop the networking stack for the underlying real-time operating system. Corey holds a bachelors degree in Electrical Engineering from the California Institute of Technology where he created an early version of the Amazing Race there involving deciphering clues from obscure Simpsons episodes. When not churning out high-quality code and listening to house music, Corey is an avid outdoors enthusiast and gamer, so try to avoid him on ski slopes and Halo alike.
